the pill

As you take the pill and explore this new territory, there are somethings you must know. SaiSei is a brand that is for the Community. By the Community.

A collection of 8888 unique SAISEI SOLDIERS took the pill and vowed to never look back. We are currently lost in this new world they call “Metaverse” and we hope to find our way with the community. Lets the journey begin.
